title: Wayne Dyer: Wayne Dyer Greatest Life Lessons
description: TIME LIMITED SPECIAL OFFER PRICEThis book contains proven steps and strategies on how to elevate your life to a higher plane of existence using the observations and perspectives of Wayne Dyer.All the observations have been compiled into a step by step format so that every reader can follow along and make changes to each area of their life sequentially. The effects are amazing and some are even immediate. Wayne's observations and ideas about perspective and prejudice, as well as tapping on to the universe to find a higher purpose are easily understood in this book because of the way it is arranged and laid out. Across the ten chapters of various concepts you will be able to find information that will make your life richer.TIME LIMITED SPECIAL OFFER PRICE
author: Sophia Franklin
